actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 225 of the Federal Salary Act of 1967, as amended.

summary.text: Declares that the terms of office of members of the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries shall begin on July 1 of the fiscal year preceding the fiscal year for which they are appointed.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 225 of the Federal Salary Act of 1967, as amended.
